name: stratITgy
tag_list: strategy, planning, transformation, business-case, change-management, governance
overview:
We specilalise in IT strategic planning for companies with annual sales revenues under 2 Billion. We help clients increase profit using technology and building IT strategies that align with business objectives.

Key products include;

  1. Profit from IT: We will show you how to reduce costs, increase revenue and margin using IT.

  2. Aligning the future; we will help you build an IT strategy that aligns with your business objectives. The strategy will clearly articulate the key business outcomes, how they will be delivered and a complete financial analysis showing the returns on investment.

Call our sales team on; +61 2 8084 2654 to discuss how we can help you.

Offices in Sydney and Melbourne. Our clients are located in Australia, New Zealand, Asia, and Europe.

Specialties; Incease your profit using technology, Profit from IT, aligning the future, aligning IT to the business, interim IT executives, IT strategy, IT architecture, IT Planning, Solution selection, Vendor negotiation, IT Governance, IT Risk, Acquisiaions, Demergers
